wikipedia_page.main: Arthur Edmund Grimshaw (1864 – July 1913) was an artist, composer, organist and conductor. He was born in Leeds, was the master of the choir at Leeds Cathedral, and was a conductor of the Leeds Symphony Orchestra.

response: * Arthur Edmund Grimshaw (1868-1913), English artist, composer, organist and conductor
* Arthur Edmund Grimshaw (1864–1913), English painter, composer and musician
